p: In order to analyze the changes in PM 2.5 population exposure during the COVID-9 epidemic. Based on the spatiotemporal distribution of PM 2.5, this research selects LBS big data during the COVID-19 epidemic, and uses a GIS-based method to allocate the acquired population data to a grid of 1 Ã— 1 km.
